name: 林敏勝
objective: 這門課程主要是介紹資料庫系統的理論與應用，內容包含有： 1. 資料庫系統的介紹與架構 2. ER 資料模式 3. 檔案儲存結構 4. 關連式資料模式 5. SQL 查詢語言 6. ER資料模式與關連式資料模式之間的轉換 7. 資料庫正規化 8. 最佳化查詢 9. 交易處理
schedule:
Week 1　　Introduction to Databases
Week 2　　Databases and Databases Users
Week 3　　Data Modeling Using the Entity-Relationship (ER) Model
Week 4　　The Enhanced Entity-Relationship (EER) Model
Week 5　　The Relational Data Model and Relational Database Constraints
Week 6　　Basic SQL
Week 7　　More SQL: Complex Queries, Triggers, Views, and Schema Modification
Week 8　　The Relational Algebra
Week 9　　Midterm Exam
Week 10　　Relational Database Design by ER- and EER-to-Relational Mapping
Week 11　　Web Database Programming Using PHP
Week 12　　Basics of Functional Dependencies and Normalization for Relational
Week 13　　Relational Database Design Algorithms and Further Dependencies
Week 14　　Introduction to Transaction Processing Concepts and Theory
Week 15　　Concurrency Control Techniques
Week 16　　Disk Storage, Basic File Structures, Hashing, and Modern Storage Architectures
Week 17　　Index Structures for Files and Physical Database Design (B-Trees and B+-Trees)
Week 18　　Final Exam
materials: Fundamentals of Database Systems by Elmasri & Navathe, PEARSON
